column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I friggin love this place. I'm a true fan of all things Spanish
column2: so naturally tapas and sangria are right up my alley. Everytime I visit
column4: we always get the bacon-wrapped dates
column7: which totally takes me right to Spain.  I've never had a tapa I didn't like.  The original red sangria is my fave.  The passion fruit
column8: mango and other special ones are more watered down and have less flavor in my opinion.  Service is usually pretty decent.  It's never been super awesome
column9: but it's respectable and that's all I can ask for.
